plugins.name: cagents
plugins.description: Universal multi-domain agent system with 230 specialized agents across 5 super-domains. V7.4 Aggressive Decomposition Edition with comprehensive work breakdowns. Controller-centric question-based delegation architecture with parallel execution up to 50x speedup. Enhanced Claude Code hooks for safety and workflow tracking.
